npcs.name: Aesthetic Winchester
utterances: Hail to you, fair citizen.  May your day be filled with discovery!

npcs.name: Amren Talbot
utterances: Focus is the key to unlocking any illusion.  The mind's eye can do many wondrous things, once it focuses.

npcs.name: Aristide Calais
utterances: Hello, adventurer.  Please mind the books and pages spread about.  I'm in the middle of researching methods of enchanting stones with magical properties and it wouldn't do to have foot prints and smudges on the documents.

npcs.name: Arth Treeskipper
utterances: The Tunarian Alliance preserves our memories of the breathing trees and singing streams of Jaggedpine.

npcs.name: Astrynia Burnwynd
utterances: Greetings <player name>, what brings you to the Concordium?

npcs.name: Auguer Prichard Fizzburn
utterances: I'm afraid I cannot speak now, friend.  Please feel free to avail yourself of our knowledge.  Right now, the city requires my concentration.

npcs.name: Bellengere the Three
utterances: If knowledge is power, and power corrupts, then it is only logical to presume that knowledge corrupts.  Rubbish, I say.  The fundamental flaw in this theory is that power corrupts, whereas it should be stated that it CAN corrupt.  This is the most important lesson to learn when using the arcane forces... as you use its power, it can as easily use you.  Take heed of this warning, friend.

npcs.name: Chronicler Steelwill
utterances: Welcome to the Three Towers.  Here we pass on our mystical knowlege to those who prove their magical prowess by serving the city of Qeynos.

npcs.name: Elspeth Astley
utterances: The winds of time change many things.  One thing remains the same, the might of the sorcerer.

npcs.name: Eoradalanu Otuden
utterances: As with all conflict, the correct resolution is to not become involved.

npcs.name: Exalted Milanthroo
utterances: I'm afraid I cannot speak now, friend.  Please feel free to avail yourself of our knowledge.  Right now, the city requires my concentration.

npcs.name: Faminae Telethar
utterances: The Tunarian Alliance does not see the greater issues beyond individual evils. Their forests might be scorched wastelands and they would still be fending off poachers.
The Concordium uses ancient and forgotten knowledge to protect us from the shadows that surround Qeynos.
Those who have neither the abilities nor the aspirations to pursue the intellectual arts will find a home at the Ironforge Exchange.

npcs.name: Feidre Kelin
utterances: May your eyes be opened to the truth of Tunare's teachings.
Tunare blesses those who remain faithful and trust in her return.
Hmmm ... from the look in your eyes, you had potential but one of your parents made a poor choice in love.

npcs.name: Felion Shadoweater
utterances: Greetings <player name>, what brings you to the Concordium?

npcs.name: Jowling
utterances: Welcome! What can I help you with?

npcs.name: Katlyn Paisley
utterances: There are no refunds for caster error at this shop! Oh ... hello you're not here about a refund.
Are you wounded?  I just made up a fresh batch of healing potions an hour ago.

npcs.name: Khalil`mun
utterances: Confound it! Where did I put that ledger?  It must be around here somewhere!
Come in!  Come in!  A mage's greeting to you, my friend!  And now, what can I mix for you?  A potion?  A salve, perhaps?  Ahhh ... I know; you need alchemical supplies, don't you?

npcs.name: Librarian Dalmas
utterances: Please be quiet when inside this place.
You do not look like as if you spend much time in libraries, but please browse around as you like, and close the door firmly when you leave.

npcs.name: Librarian Dungil
utterances: Please be quick, I am very busy.

npcs.name: Pupil Adept Wazzlefop
utterances: Welcome to the Concordium.  All those that seek knowledge of the magical may pass within these walls!

npcs.name: Rune Shimmerstar
utterances: What brings you to the Three Towers? Study of the arcane arts broadens your understanding of the world we live in. You would do well to remember this.

npcs.name: Tilliana Steamsieve
utterances: Well, hello hello <player name>, welcome to the Concordium.  What can I do for you today?

npcs.name: Vishra
utterances: May I help you?
